snippet: Two attacks on Monday in Maiduguri and Damaturu, state capitals in northern Nigeria, were among a wave of assaults showing Boko Haram’s ability to strike at will, especially against civilians.
abstract: Continuing attacks across northern Nigeria highlight how Islamist terrorist group Boko Haram remains able to strike with ease in the region.

byline.contributor: Jonathan Gopep contributed reporting from Damaturu, Nigeria, and Hamza Idris from Maiduguri, Nigeria.

lead_paragraph: Two attacks on Monday in Maiduguri and Damaturu, state capitals in northern Nigeria, were among a wave of assaults showing Boko Haram’s ability to strike at will, especially against civilians.

headline.main: Boko Haram Attacks With Ease, Causing Death and Mayhem in Nigeria’s Provinces
headline.print_headline: Boko Haram Attacks With Ease, Causing Death and Mayhem in Nigeria’s Provinces
